headline: Cannabis Cosmetics Market Report 2025-2029 | Rising Demand for Natural and Organic Products Fuels Growth, Driven by Sustainability, Wellness Trends, and Innovation
summary: The Cannabis Cosmetics Market is projected to surge from $5.48B in 2024 to $22.43B by 2029, driven by rising demand for natural, eco-friendly beauty products. Leading companies like The Estee Lauder Companies and Lush are innovating with CBD-infused skincare. Key regions include North America and Europe.
